sections.heading: operation of public schools; notice to State Board of Education
sections.text: No public school district shall convert to a year-round operation without notifying the State Board of Education of compliance with sections 79-503 to 79-505.SourceLaws 1973, LB 65, ยง 3;Laws 1993, LB 348, ยง 9;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-201.
